reviews.review: My friend hooked me up to this (now i need help)

Pros
-Wide variety of different play styles among the killers.
-Surviving is scary and intense when you are new.
-Cool customizations for characters
-Lots of events throughout the year
-Movie icon killers and survivors
-New content throughout the year

Cons
-Balance becomes an obvious issue once you become more experienced in the game.
-More than half the killer roster aren't viable in high ranks.
-Devs don't understand their own game nor listen to community feedback a lot of the time.
-Ranking system is awful.
-Cosmetics are absurdly expensive.
-New content tends to be a disappointment.
-Extremely toxic community
-Lots of bugs and technical issues; no patch seems to ever NOT break the game.
-Meta always seems to stay the same. Ruin is STILL required at red ranks.
-Buffed Bubba
-Tunneling and camping

This game is Trash, Don't buy it

if i could give this absolute disgrace of a game -10000000 out of ten i would. i would literally pay people to not play this game . the devs share one brain cell between them, they are all sooo stupid . they care only about survivors and killers get shafted every ten seconds. this is not a video game , this is cruel and unusual punishment. the devs should be ashamed of themselves . boycott anything this lunatics do .  STAY AWAY FROM THIS GAME .

they've had an additional 252 hours to make this game better and haven't
DbD is pay to win, it's frustrating, it's filled with lazy and dumb design choices, buggy; but still fun at many times.
muy buen juego te llevas algunos sustos pero muy buen juego es mejor jugar con amigos

game is absolutely painful to play. when it's fun and enjoyable, it's amazing. but when i'm matched with people who only want to win, bringing the meta and knowing every single loop like the back of their hand, mind gaming and making me wanna punch a hole in my wall, i want to uninstall. the new MMR system they've implemented has pushed the game in such a toxic and tournament-like state, making everybody want run the strongest possible builds and perks that i wanna put the game down all together. i want to have fun. play casual. have some challenging games that make me use my skill a little bit to actually win if i want to. use memey builds and perks that could be fun or interesting. i don't want to sweat every single game and bring the same fucking 4 perks on every single character i play as just i can *maybe* win and have a chance. 

if you like this game, good for you, you seem to have unlocked a level of not caring that i have yet to discover. if you're new, you'll probably enjoy this game since these devs cater to people like you. nothing bad about it, but its the truth.

over 1600 hrs later, and i cant find any enjoyment in this game right now. hopefully BHVR changes my mind, but knowing them, that'll probably never happen.
